reviewText: This is not the correct region for the United States. Will not play. There is nothing on the box or in the Amazon description that indicates this.

Why can't I get English subtitles with the movies?  I get them with the interviews
but absolutely nothing when I start the movie.  Very frustrating!!  If anyone has the answer I'd be pleased to know.
Every film I have (12 now) from the Pol-Art(sp?)film company has exactly the same
problems. Do I need to buy a new DVD player just to watch these?  I certainly would love to watch these films!  Anyone have any ideas? Thanks in advance.
